text_block_list.text: It had been a few days since I met Matikanefukukitaru ——

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Trainer! Excuse my interruption!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I was thinking I should really get down to training 
for the Selection Race from today forward.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
My horoscope did inform me that this period is 
a terrifically important one to my development.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Therefore, I am relying on your guidance, if you please!
choice_data_list: <size=36>Do I have to remind you I'm not your trainer!?</size>

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: The Fortune Corner TV segment indicated that I should heed the insights of an expert, and so I kindly ask of thee, I beg of theee～!

Our exchange concluded with me being pushed 
into accompanying her for training……

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: A m-mock race?! That is to be my training, a mock race?!
choice_data_list: Well, you wanted to "really get down" to it.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I may have a recollection of that indeeeed, but even so…!

My opinion was that, to do well in the race, she would 
find great benefit to amassing experience. I therefore 
decided to schedule her a mock race.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Howdy～! How are y'all doing today!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hiiiie!? Out of all the choices, you set me up against Taiki?!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Trainer called me here as your friend!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Not a chance in all nine hells! Taiki's in such a different league 
she could be making her debut any day, you know!?
choice_data_list: I thought you were listening to an expert?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Pyaaaaaah～!! I am unable to refute that…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Then let me at least consult the spirits about this!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Eko Eko Azarashi… Eko Eko Ottosei… O victory… come to me～～～～～!

Cryptic sounds flowing forth from her mouth, she conjured up 
a pencil out of the blue, which she stood upright and let fall.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Nuooh!? Would you look at that… Great Luck!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I will be accepting this mock race, Trainer! 
And I won't treat it any different from a real race!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I'm sure you don't mind, Taiki?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Not at all! I'm ready go to! 
Let's have a fun time racing together!
So their mock race began, Matikanefukukitaru vs Taiki Shuttle.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hufh… hufh… hufh… hufh…!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Taiki's speed really is in a different league. 
I can't afford to lose focus for a split second…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Nevertheless, I have the power of Great Luck at my side! 
Fame and bettered fortune await me at the finish line～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I looost!!
choice_data_list: Well, so much for your Great Luck.
Well, so much for your Great Luck.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Gueeeeh…! My Great Luck still applies!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
If I think of this as a frustrating experience leading 
me to putting in more hard work, I'd say the result 
is greatly positive!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: To get right on it then, I will go running so that I may win next time! Uwaaaaaah～～!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Aww, we're done already? 
I wanted to run together some more!!

That evening, as I was heading home, I identified 
some curious sounds as a horsegirl's voice.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Funyakaaa～… Hanyakaaa～ Reveal to me tonight's lucky course!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: … Oh, hm? If it isn't my trainer.
choice_data_list: What are you up to here?
What are you up to here?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I am planning on going running, so I was divining 
the most appropriate course to use!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Divine Shiraoki would be very cross with me if I tried to gain 
fortune without expending any effort myself, after all!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Yes, she is a deity who appears to me only in dreams, 
leading me to prosperity! I am very grateful for her.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
She always guides me to the right path whenever I feel 
lost and anxious, as she did after my race with Taiki.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
For me to even be here running is all thanks 
to my trust in her and the powers of divination. 
Truly, I am not worthy～
choice_data_list: I can tell she's extremely important to you.
I can tell she's extremely important to you.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
That she is! Have you perhaps already understood 
the magnitude of Divine Shiraoki's blessings!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Either way, I must be off for training! 
Fortune guide me to my lucky course!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Wu-hoaaaah!? Why is there a puddle of water here!?

The arcane forces of divination must be what support 
Matikanefukukitaru in her desire to run.

I feel like I have gotten a glimpse of 
what this peculiar girl is really like.
